page.title: 08TRINITY FAIR,BURRINGTON
page.content: {BURRINGTON FAIR}was originally held on Trinity Monday and Tuesday--the cattle and sheep sale on Monday, and the sports with roundabouts and a military band etc. on Tuesday.Now the Fair is held on{Trinity Wednesday}or a date near.Years ago there were 1,000 lambs} penned beside the school wall. Over 150 bullocks were sold in the square. Carts and butts were put across to keep them from the church gates. Min. of Ag. regulations stopped this, and now{the sale is in Pickard's yard.} } {Trinity Week}has many special activities: in 1985 Bingo with Hot Dogs, a slide show, a Whist Drive and Country Dancing were in the Parish Hall.{Sports}are on Saturday afternoon in the School field. There are races for all age groups. There are{cash {prizes for competitors and winners.}
